goals.complete: I received an urgent communication from Jhavi: Rytlock and Crecia haven't checked in for days, and Braham stormed off to find them without any Vigil support. I need to head to Jora's Keep in Bjora Marches for a full update.

I found Braham in a forest to the west, accompanied by none other than Garm. No luck yet finding Rytlock and Crecia, but we now know the source of the whispers is here, in this valley: Drakkar. Our next stop is a nearby kodan settlement, hopefully to learn more.
